name: Charging Ghosts
description:
In Ghosts Charger you only need 1-2-3 as Buttons. To switch between the 3 Gates. The Ghosts disappear when you see them. But beware they will get faster rely quick! Sometimes the Mouse does not work in Fullscreen try Using Alt+Tab to fix!
I hope you have a little quick fun with it. I enjoyed making it. 
Greets Vastir
